attribute_requirements.description: Use this to describe the state of an item, with examples such as New, New Without Tags, New With Damaged Box, Refurbished, Manufacturer Refurbished, Restored.
For refurbished items, this is the original/new equivalent product identifier ID different from the restored product identifier ID.
Refers to the original/new equivalent product identifier for refurbished items.
Specify one Original/New Equivalent Product ID and its ID Type. Required if Condition = Restored.
